text:
I love how you can do the insta cash if you need money but i hate how you have to do $50 max for each amount so they can get multiple tips and multiple $3.99 fee's. If you're allowed to borrow $300 then you should be able to take it all at once. They say its free but it ends up costing a lot.

EDITED:
I understand the fees and yes its free. I also have no problem tiping either. Im not sure you understand what I'm saying. If i borrow $300 then I have to pay $3.99 six times then leave a $2-10 tip six times also being you guys only let customers take $50 at a time up to $300. I'm just saying it was nice the old way where you could take as much as you needed up to $300 in ONE transaction not SIX transactions. Its basically a minimum of $36 in tips and fees since you set it up this way. Technically you can say its free but really its not. More like false advertising. Just thought you would want some feed back from a customer to better your services.
title: I love how you can do the insta cash if…

reply.message: Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when you’re in a pinch.We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: Great app. Gives you money you need to help out til next payday. The only negative I have is you can only take $50 at a time. I mean if you are allowed $100, you can get it all in the same day. But you have to get it in $50 increments, which is 2 tips and 2 charges for having it deposited into your account.
title: Great app

reply.message: Hi there, Janet. Thank you so much for this awesome 4-star review! We're happy to know that our 0% APR InstaCash was able to provide assistance to you! Additionally, we designed Instacash to help you access smaller amounts of cash in a pinch, such as for an unexpected late fee or a can't-miss date night and we designed it to be easy to payback! It isn't meant to be a way to fund your larger expenses. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in maximum increments of $50. We offer turbo delivery options for a small fee of $3.99 (to receive it instantly on your RoarMoney account or $4.99 for instant delivery on your external checking account or debit card. As an alternative, we also offer free delivery options to your RoarMoney account (receive your Instacash funds in 24-48 hours at no additional cost) or to an external bank account (receive your Instacash funds in 3-5 business days at no additional cost.). Tips are absolutely optional and do not impact eligibility or availability, however, we encourage you to support the community and we highly appreciate it! You see, it takes a big team here at MoneyLion to keep 0% APR Instacash running smoothly 24/7. It's one of the most popular perks of membership! And your tips are what help us cover the high costs of administering Instacash at 0% APR for the large and growing MoneyLion community. We're happy to know that our products and other services are able to provide assistance and help you with securing that financial stability! We do appreciate your feedback so that we may continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help makes MoneyLion ROAR! Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub? Thanks again for being the best part of the MoneyLion.

text: I have never had too many issues with MoneyLion since opening accounts with them.  The one thing I dislike is that having a checking account with them means nothing when payments are processed through said checking account.  In my opinion, when you have a Roar account, it should not take a week to show a processed payment when it clearly shows processed in the transactions on your account.  I believe this needs to change.  If it's an outside checking account, fine, but not the MoneyLion account.

text:
Loan payments; late fees applied~
Credit Cards; chargd off~
Accounts; closed~
…the list goes on!

MoneyLion has been a key element in my financial progression. The simplicity, along with functionality, makes MoneyLion, the, best thing to happen to me, in these trying times. Fast & easy; on-line. Immediate response! I was on my way to better financial health. Slow, but definitely a steady, upward climb. No missed oppurtunities. Take, “the” best offer/s. Be educated. Stay informed. Seeing it happen, before it happens…because of MoneyLion. I know I can be…debt free!
